author: jeremias
msg: Added building of a Maven artifact (Ant target: maven-artifact)

author: danielf
msg: The BlockContext wasn't pushed at the BlockCallStack when doing a polymorphic call through the block protocol (e.g. block:/foo), this made subsequent block protocol call be called relative to the wrong context. This hopefully fixes the problem reported in JIRA issue COCOON-1939.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Iain Fogg adressing an issue related to "POS Multiple bar code product match" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-238)

author: andreas
msg: Removed some offending lines from SiteTreeNodeImplTest. This funcationality is now tested by the core SiteManagerTest.
